question:
Consider the following statements about the Pradhan Mantri Rojgar Protsahan Yojana (PMRPY):
  1. It is a scheme to incentivise employers registered with the Employees' Provident Fund Organisation for job creation
  2. This scheme is available for the employees earning wages less than Rs 15,000/- per month under semi-skilled and unskilled category
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is correct</u>. The Pradhan Mantri Rojgar Protsahan Yojana (PMRPY) Scheme aims to incentivise employers registered with the Employeesâ€™ Provident Fund Organisation for job creation. The scheme has been designed to incentivise employers for the generation of new employment where GoI pays the 8.33% EPS contribution of the employer for the new employment. In the case of the textile (apparel) sector, the employers are also eligible to get the 3.67% EPF contribution paid by the Government. <u>Second statement is correct</u>. The scheme is available for the employees earning wages less than Rs 15000/ month under semi-skilled and unskilled category.
